example.eg: Every Wednesday, the Spanish community here gets together at a café.
example.egtrans: 每个星期三，这里的西班牙侨民都会在咖啡厅聚会。

example.eg: We live in Springfield.  It is a lovely community.
example.egtrans: 我们住在斯普林菲尔德。这是一个很好的社区。

example.eg: The gay community must have the right to be heard.
example.egtrans: 同性恋群体必须享有发表意见的权利。

example.eg: The community was outraged by the murder. A good leader puts the needs of the community ahead of personal gain.
example.egtrans: 这桩谋杀案让整个社会义愤填膺。好的领导人必须将集体的需要置于个人利益之前。

example.eg: The community of Franciscan friars lived together.
The international community was outraged by the genocide.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 社会, （国家的政治经济等的）共同体

example.eg: The residents of the commune believed in a community of goods.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 共同所有, 共同享有

example.eg: This charity raises funds for community development.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 业余戏剧活动, 业余戏剧表演

example.eg: The community at large is asking the police to do something about the rising crime rate.
The summer program at the community center keeps the kids off the streets.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 社区中心, 社区活动中心

example.eg: You can save thousands of dollars by taking courses at a community college before attending university.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 社区学院, 社区大学

example.eg: The neighborhood set up a watch group to do community policing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 社区治安, 社区警务

example.eg: He was sentenced to 100 hours of community service.
example.egtrans: 他被判处100小时的社区服务工作。

example.eg: The lockdown started after the health department detected community spread of the virus.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 社区剧院, 社区戏院

dsense.name: community transmission
dsense.guideword: (spread of infection with no clear source)

example.eg: Alex is a respectable member of the community.
